about_the_game:
The novel "Copiasu," a prequel to the game "Starnaut" is now available on Steam.


Summary
This is a story in the alternate world where every single AI is evolved in the future.
In 2040, Copiasu the protagonist boy was about to nervously read out his essay about "The Strange Notebook".
In that essay, there were many friends who Copiasu has never even seen their face before.
When he was done reading it, he thought he was glad he lied about it.

Let us go home.
Where are we returning to whose home? "Remaster it", he can hear the voice.
As Copiasu turns, he witnessed a girl who he is not familiar with...

This is a story that nobody knows, but only Copiasu knows.

Information
・PDF File
・English / Japanese
・Install Pass
Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\STARNAUT\STARNAUT - Prologue COPIASU
